ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: then place it in a secure repository
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then We lodged you in a secure place (the womb)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: which We then placed in a secure repository
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and place it in a secure place
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We then kept it in a safe place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then We placed it in a place of safety,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We placed it in a secure resting-place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: that We laid within a sure lodging
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Which We laid up in a safe abode
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then placed it in a secure repository [the womb],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Which We placed in a depository safe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [and] then lodged it in a secure abode
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The which We placed in a place of rest, firmly fixed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then We placed it in a place of safety (womb),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: which We placed within a sure lodging
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then lodged it in a secure place?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We placed it in a firm lodging
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:21] then lodged it in a secure abode, that is, the womb,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Which We laid up in a safe abode) in the woman's womb.
